text: Yalla kinni toogimah yan mar√¢ fanah farmoytay (Nabii Mucammad frae kinnuk) keenik yaniy Yallih Qhuraanih aayoota keenil yakriye keenih rubtem, kaadu koroosannuu kee dambittek ken saytunnoysaah, Qhuraan kee Sunna (cadiis kinnuk) ken barsa, usun kaak (Nabii kinnuk) naharal cakkik baxxaqqa le makoh addat sugen
